original: @237b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @237b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: shr'i dvi bhu dza sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: shr'i dvi bhu dza sam ba ra s'a dha nam /
translated: Śrīdvayabhūjasampurasadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Connate Sādhana of Śrī Two-Armed Cakrasaṃvara

original: dpal bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog lhan cig skyes pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Śrī Coemergent Cakrasaṃvara.

original: bdag gi dge bas khams gsum srid mtha'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
analyzed: bdag gi dge bas khams gsum srid mtha'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa //
translated: Through my virtue, may I eliminate all the suffering of the three realms and the peak of existence

original: bsal nas bde ba mtha' dag la ni dgod par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bsal nas bde ba mtha' dag la ni dgod par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: and establish all in every kind of bliss.

original: sangs rgyas thob par bgyi'o zhes kyang smon pa bskyed nas su //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thob par bgyi'o zhes kyang smon pa bskyed nas su //
translated: Having also generated the aspiration, “I will attain buddhahood,”

original: gzhan dag 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yang ni yongs su spel bar bya //
analyzed: gzhan dag 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yang ni yongs su spel bar bya //
translated: I will also increase the nature of engaging.

original: rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste //
translated: The yoga should be known as threefold:

original: byin gyis brlab dang rab brtag dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs rdzogs pa'i //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab dang rab brtag dang // bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs rdzogs pa'i //
translated: the yoga of consecration, the yoga of thorough analysis, and the yoga of perfecting the inconceivable form.

original: rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
analyzed: rnal 'byor sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags //
translated: The buddhas praise yoga.

original: gang yang skad cig sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: gang yang skad cig sbyor ba yis //
translated: Also, in an instant,

original: rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror 'gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gror 'gyur //
translated: one becomes Vajra dakini.

original: rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can bzhin //
analyzed: rdzus te skyes pa'i sems can bzhin //
translated: Like a sentient being born spontaneously.

original: sa bon med par bsgom bya ste //
analyzed: sa bon med par bsgom bya ste //
translated: Meditate without a seed.

original: dpral bar gnas pa'i thong phreng can //
analyzed: dpral bar gnas pa'i thong phreng can //
translated: The garland of skulls is on the forehead.

original: zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'chang //
analyzed: zla ba phyed pa spyi bor 'chang //
translated: The half-moon is held on the crown.

original: phyag rgya drug dang mgo phreng can //
analyzed: phyag rgya drug dang mgo phreng can //
translated: The six symbolic ornaments and the garland of heads,

original: spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can //
analyzed: spyan gsum sna tshogs rdo rje can //
translated: The three eyes, and the crossed vajra,

original: g-yas brkyang gom stabs bkod pa yis //
analyzed: g-yas brkyang gom stabs bkod pa yis //
translated: The right leg extended in the dancing pose,

original: sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la //
analyzed: sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma la //
translated: On the variegated lotus and sun,

original: gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas //
analyzed: gnas pa'i 'jigs byed dus mtshan bcas //
translated: Bhairava and Kālarātri are suppressed.

original: mnan cing stag gi pags pa 'chang //
analyzed: mnan cing stag gi pags pa 'chang //
translated: The tiger skin is worn.

original: nag po mi bskyod cod pan can //
analyzed: nag po mi bskyod cod pan can //
translated: The black one has an Akṣobhya crown.

original: rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan //🔽dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu ral par ldan // dpa' bo rdo rje phag mo ni //
translated: The vajra and the bell are in the hair.🔽The hero Vajravārāhī

original: rdo rje thod pa khrag bkang bsnams //
analyzed: rdo rje thod pa khrag bkang bsnams //
translated: holds a vajra and a skull filled with blood.

original: dmar po ska rags dum bus mtshan //
analyzed: dmar po ska rags dum bus mtshan //
translated: Red, marked with a piece of cloth and a bone,

original: spyan gsum mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
analyzed: spyan gsum mgo bo'i phreng ba can //
translated: three eyes, a garland of heads,

original: phyag rgya lnga ma skra grol ma //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ma skra grol ma //
translated: the five symbolic ornaments, and loose hair,

original: phyogs gos sangs rgyas dbu brgyan ma //🔽de ltar skad cig gis rdzogs par //
analyzed: phyogs gos sangs rgyas dbu brgyan ma // de ltar skad cig gis rdzogs par //
translated: the quarter cloth, and the Buddha crown.🔽In that way, one’s body is visualized

original: bdag gis lus ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bdag gis lus ni bsgom par bya //
translated: in an instant.

original: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //
analyzed: ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin gsal //
translated: The nature of the five pristine consciousnesses is clear.

original: sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
translated: The light rays of the buddhas radiate.

original: sems kyi spyod yul gcig tu ni //
analyzed: sems kyi spyod yul gcig tu ni //
translated: In the domain of the mind,

original: de dag kho na yun ring bsam //🔽sems can gnas der @238a * //
analyzed: de dag kho na yun ring bsam // sems can gnas der @238a * //
translated: they think only of that for a long time.

original: bzhag nas su //
analyzed: bzhag nas su //
translated: Having placed sentient beings in that place,

original: de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba brtsam //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas dga' ba brtsam //
translated: then the buddhas begin to delight.

original: chos dbyings rgyal mtshan kun chags las //
analyzed: chos dbyings rgyal mtshan kun chags las //
translated: From the attachment to the victory banner of the dharmadhātu,

original: dman min 'dzag pa phun tshogs rnams //
analyzed: dman min 'dzag pa phun tshogs rnams //
translated: the excellent, non-inferior, dripping

original: yang dag rig pa dga' ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: yang dag rig pa dga' ba'i tshogs //
translated: is the assembly of the delight of the perfect knowledge.

original: 'dzag pa can ma 'char ba gang //
analyzed: 'dzag pa can ma 'char ba gang //
translated: What is the rising of the dripping?

original: de ni rgya chen yid byed pa //
analyzed: de ni rgya chen yid byed pa //
translated: That is the vast mental activity.

original: 'phro ba 'dus byas rgyun rnams la //
analyzed: 'phro ba 'dus byas rgyun rnams la //
translated: The continuous emanation of the compounded

original: rtag tu bsgom zhing 'di bzhin du //
analyzed: rtag tu bsgom zhing 'di bzhin du //
translated: is always meditated in this way.

original: 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya //
analyzed: 'od gsal rjes su dran par bya //
translated: One should recall the luminosity.

original: sna tshogs mtsho skyes nyi ma dang ni 'jigs byed dus mtshan mo //
analyzed: sna tshogs mtsho skyes nyi ma dang ni 'jigs byed dus mtshan mo //
translated: The ocean of diversity, the sun, Bhairava, and Kālarātri,

original: mdzes ma bdag po nam mkha'i nor bu de bzhin gshegs lnga yi //
analyzed: mdzes ma bdag po nam mkha'i nor bu de bzhin gshegs lnga yi //
translated: the beautiful one, the lord, the sky jewel, and the five tathāgatas,

original: lus dang yan lag mchog dang 'od dkar thig le n'a da ste //
analyzed: lus dang yan lag mchog dang 'od dkar thig le n'a da ste //
translated: the body, the supreme limbs, the white bindu, and the nada

original: 'di rnams sgrib pa med pa'i gnas su rim gyis gzhug par bya //
analyzed: 'di rnams sgrib pa med pa'i gnas su rim gyis gzhug par bya //
translated: These should be gradually introduced into the state free of obscurations.🔽Just as the breath disappears

original: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la //🔽kun nas yal bar 'gyur ba ni //🔽de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
analyzed: ji ltar dbugs rlung me long la // kun nas yal bar 'gyur ba ni // de bzhin rnal 'byor yang dag mthar //
translated: in a mirror,🔽so the yogi should repeatedly

original: yang dag yang du gzhug par bya //
analyzed: yang dag yang du gzhug par bya //
translated: introduce the mind into the perfect limit.

original: thams cad khyab pa snang ba med //
analyzed: thams cad khyab pa snang ba med //
translated: The all-pervading, non-apparent,

original: snying rje ro gcig yid kyis ni //
analyzed: snying rje ro gcig yid kyis ni //
translated: with a mind of single taste in compassion,

original: bdag po yin bzhin stong pa nyid //
analyzed: bdag po yin bzhin stong pa nyid //
translated: the lord, emptiness,

original: skad cig kho nar 'khyud par 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig kho nar 'khyud par 'gyur //
translated: will be embraced in an instant.

original: rnam bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab de yis 'khyud pa po //
analyzed: rnam bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab de yis 'khyud pa po //
translated: The one embraced by that Bhagavatī Prajñā, with and without form,

original: skye 'jig spangs ba mi 'gyur bde ba dgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs pa po //
analyzed: skye 'jig spangs ba mi 'gyur bde ba dgod pa la sogs bde ba spangs pa po //
translated: free from arising and ceasing, the one who abandons unchanging bliss and so forth,

original: sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed byed sku gsum ldan pa khams gsum yang dag rig pa po //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams ni skyed byed sku gsum ldan pa khams gsum yang dag rig pa po //
translated: the one who generates the buddhas, endowed with the three bodies, the one who truly knows the three realms,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to that very Bhagavat, the primordial buddha of supreme omniscience.

original: mi 'gyur ba bde ba ye shes dus //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba bde ba ye shes dus //
translated: The time of unchanging bliss wisdom,

original: thabs dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid de //
analyzed: thabs dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid de //
translated: The nature of method and compassion,

original: shes bya'i rnam par 'gro 'khor lo //
analyzed: shes bya'i rnam par 'gro 'khor lo //
translated: The wheel of the movement of objects of knowledge,

original: shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab stong nyid bdag nyid do //
translated: The nature of wisdom and emptiness,

original: kam de bde ba rgyu med blo //
analyzed: kam de bde ba rgyu med blo //
translated: The bliss of ka without a cause,

original: snying rje ye shes mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: snying rje ye shes mi 'gyur ba //
translated: Compassion and unchanging wisdom,

original: stod nyid pra ti se na bzhin //
analyzed: stod nyid pra ti se na bzhin //
translated: Like the prātimokṣa,

original: dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o //🔽kun nas phyag dang zhabs ldan pa //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad mthong ba'o // kun nas phyag dang zhabs ldan pa //
translated: It is seen in all things.🔽It has hands and feet everywhere,

original: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal //🔽kun nas dran ldan 'jig rten du //
analyzed: kun nas spyan dang dbu dang zhal // kun nas dran ldan 'jig rten du //
translated: Eyes, faces, and heads everywhere,🔽It is everywhere, and it is the memory of the world.

original: thams cad kun du g-yogs nas bzhugs //
analyzed: thams cad kun du g-yogs nas bzhugs //
translated: It exists, covering everything.

original: 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
analyzed: 'di ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku //
translated: This is the svabhāvikakāya.

original: stong nyid snying rje gnyis med pa //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje gnyis med pa //
translated: Emptiness and compassion are nondual.

original: ma ning zhes byar grags pa ste //
analyzed: ma ning zhes byar grags pa ste //
translated: It is renowned as the “neutral state.”

original: 'ga' zhig tu ni zung 'jug ces //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig tu ni zung 'jug ces //
translated: In some places, it is called “union.”

original: sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi ni //🔽phung po la sogs 'di na gnas //
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi ni // phung po la sogs 'di na gnas //
translated: The aggregates and so on of the unobscured Dharma🔽Dwell here.

original: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di //
analyzed: rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid 'di //
translated: This characteristic of the support and the supported

original: thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid yin no //
analyzed: thams cad dkyil 'khor nyid yin no //
translated: Is the maṇḍala itself.

original: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa lhan cig @238b skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal bde mchog phyag gnyis pa lhan cig @238b skyes pa'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Sādhana of the Coemergent Two-Armed Glorious Cakrasaṃvara🔽is complete.

original: dngos grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po dpal rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dngos grub brnyes pa'i pandi ta chen po dpal rdo rje dril bu pa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The great siddha, the glorious vajra-bell-bearer,🔽the great paṇḍita Śrīvajraghānapa,🔽and the Tibetan translator, the Buddhist monk Chöjé Pal,

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig pan chen grub pa brnyes pa rje btsun ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po lnga rig pan chen grub pa brnyes pa rje btsun ratna rakshi ta'i zhal snga nas dang / chag lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong chos rje dpal gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: translated and revised this text.
